Title: Pocket Watch with 31" Chain Necklace OR 14" Belt Chain Vintage Style Mom or Dad
Description: Handsome vintage style pocket watch on a 31" chain necklace OR upgrade to a 14" belt chain. The pocket watch has a etched scrolled design front and back (see photos). Made of a bronze colored metal. In working order, quartz battery, keeps good time. The watch measures 1 7/8" in diameter not including the stem. In excellent working condition. Perfect gift for Mom or Dad, or anyone else you can think of. I also have this pocket watch for all the branches of the military, fire dept., police, and other varieties. You can also get this item customized with your own personal message and/or photo. Contact me to find out how. Comes gift wrapped. All of my items comes form a smoke free, happy healthy home. Everything is in very good to excellent condition. Any exceptions will be clearly noted. I absolutely DO COMBINE SHIPPING, so shop away. Thank you for visiting Bright Eyes Treasures!! California residents add 8% sales tax. Paypal shipped within 1 business days; contact me for other forms of payment. All payments MUST be received within 5 days of purchase or item will be relisted.
